description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist DAB to improve its core function of banking supervision and regulation, and to help improve access to formal banking services by establishing key initial building blocks for further financial sector reform.

sector.narrative: Financial Sector oversight and policy/banking regulation & restructuring

title.narrative: Increase in the number of commercial banks staff trained in Afghanistan Institute of Banking and Finance.

comment.narrative: AIBF is a recognized institute and is scaling up its activities. This figure includes commercial banks and MFIs staff trained byAIBF.

title.narrative: Increase in number of items of collateral registered in CR.

comment.narrative: Movable Collateral Registry is operational. Total value registered is AF 28.4 Billion. All the commercial banks now have accounts.

title.narrative: Increase in the number of credit reports sent by the public credit registry to the commercial banks.

comment.narrative: Public Credit Registry was launched in December 2013.

title.narrative: Improve the ranking of the Getting Credit indicator in the annual Doing Business Report

comment.narrative: The 2014 Doing Business report recognizes progress in the indicator: "Afghanistan strengthened its secured transactions system byimplementing a unified collateral registry".

title.narrative: Decrease in the number of days required to process supervisory data collected from the commercial banks.

comment.narrative: Approach to strengthening banking supervision and in particular off-site supervision needs to be reviewed in the context of therestructuring of the project.

title.narrative: Overall improvement of DAB's core functions of banking supervision and regulation as preceived by the commercial banks through biannual service and evaluated by the supreme council.

comment.narrative: No new survey was undertaken since the Kabul Bank crisis.

title.narrative: Increase in the number of training courses implemented on the basis of training need assessment results.

comment.narrative: Approach to strengthening HR management not effective.

title.narrative: DAB's financial statements prepared according to international financial reporting standards with an UNQUALIFIED opinion
